entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for June 05, 2024

summary.caption: “You ever get that urge, Frank? It begins with looking down from 50 stories up, thinking about the meaninglessness of life, listening to dark voices deep inside you, and you think, ‘Should I? … Should I?  … Should I push someone off?’”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for June 05, 2024

summary.caption: “My God, Carlson! After years of searching, this is an emotional moment for me! … Voilà! I give you the Secret Elephant Breeding Grounds!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for June 05, 2024

summary.caption: “Ben—what d’ya say we turn the power off for a while and let the little guy roam around?”
